about.title: About Mfk
about.subtitle: Professional Home Maintenance with Unmatched Quality Standards

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Mfk was founded in Sharjah with a simple vision: to keep every home in top condition—without hassle or stress. From day one, we prioritized customer comfort and service quality. That’s why we focused on delivering professional maintenance solutions, including AC cleaning, plumbing, electrical work, painting, interior finishes, and insulation — fast, reliable, and headache-free.
ourStory.paragraph2: Today, we proudly serve hundreds of homes across the UAE. Most of our customers return for more services and recommend us to their families and friends. With every visit, we prove that quality isn’t just a promise — it’s something you can feel from the first interaction. No matter how much we grow, we’ll always listen closely and serve you like you’re our very first customer.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you use our services.

information_collection.title: 1. Information Collection
information_collection.content:
We collect certain personal information when you register on the website or use our services, including:

- Name
- Phone number
- Email address

information_usage.title: 2. Information Usage
information_usage.content:
We use the information we collect to improve our services, including:

- Providing technical support and enhancing the user experience
- Sending updates about our services
- Analyzing data to improve performance

information_sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
information_sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to any third party. However, we may share data with trusted parties for the purpose of analytics and service improvement.

data_protection.title: 4. Data Protection
data_protection.content: We implement strict security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or unlawful use.

user_rights.title: 5. Your Rights
user_rights.content: You can request to modify or delete your personal data at any time by contacting us.

policy_changes.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
policy_changes.content: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy from time to time. You will be notified of any major changes via email or on our website.
